commonSessionSetup (  ) 

Initalize a common session If the common session variables are not set, give them their defaults These are assigned to the $_SESSION global variable

commonValidationCustomizationValues ( $  ignore = false  ) 

Validation the customization values given through the $_GET and $_SESSION variables $_GET should be set with the desired values These are checked and then assigned to the $_SESSION

Assign the first value of the acceptable values as the default
